content: This content would be helpful to a homeowner who is planning to build, renovate or extend their home. The homeowner can get legal assistance from Becker Watt Lawyers in reviewing and advising on residential building contracts, negotiating with builders and resolving disputes, among others. This would ensure that the homeowner is fully protected throughout the construction process and that all contracts are compliant with industry legislation and regulations. Additionally, the homeowner can get legal assistance in complying with the Building Industry Fairness (Security of Payment) Act 2017, which is an integral part of getting paid for construction work in Queensland.
